content:
Craft an item of type: orange_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "infested_stone_bricks", "quantity": 59, "index": 12}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 14}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 44, "index": 15}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 5, "index": 17}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 19, "index": 24}]

thought: To craft an orange_stained_glass, I first need to craft orange dye. To do so, I need to place an orange tulip into the crafting grid. I will therefore move the orange tulip from slot 20 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: orange_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "infested_stone_bricks", "quantity": 59, "index": 12}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 14}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 44, "index": 15}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 5, "index": 17}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 19, "index": 24}]
thought: The orange dye has been crafted and placed in the craft slot (0). I will now move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: orange_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "infested_stone_bricks", "quantity": 59, "index": 12}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 14}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 44, "index": 15}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 5, "index": 17}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 19, "index": 24}]
thought: To make orange stained glass, I need to place a dye in the middle of a 3x3 grid of glass. I have enough glass to fill the crafting grid, so I will start by filling the top left corner.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: orange_stained_glass

thought: I have already placed a piece of glass in the top left corner of the crafting grid, so I will now place another piece of glass in the top middle slot.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1
